module.name: fgcautoshare
module.description: The Fgcautoshare product series posts title, text, images and url for new/edited Prestashop product, forum posts etc. automatically as status messages to Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, E-Mail accounts and other social channels.
module.author: FGCTechlution
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to delete all settings and your logs?
